Higham Hill is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Waltham Forest. The ward has existed since the creation of the borough on 1 April 1965 and was first used in the 1964 elections. It returns three councillors to Waltham Forest London Borough Council.. The ward was subject to boundary revisions in 1978, 2002 and 2022.
Waltham Forest elections since 2022
There was a revision of ward boundaries in Waltham Forest in 2022.
2023 by-election
The by-election took place on 26 October 2023, following the resignation of Alistair Strathern.
2022 election
The election took place on 5 May 2022.
